description:
Only 8% of people consistently accomplish their most significant goals. These are the world's highest achievers, and this unique online training course teaches you exactly how to implement what they do differently! In this program, you'll learn:

  • The most common advice from goal-setting experts that you should absolutely IGNORE
  • he 7 mistakes that most people make which cause them to fail… and how you can avoid them!
  • The 9 strategies that high achievers use to repeatedly achieve their goals year after year
  • The little-known secret to GETTING MORE SLEEP while still ACCOMPLISHING MORE
  • How high achievers A.I.M. S.M.A.R.T.E.R. to reach more of their goals
  • How to stop following other people’s dreams and start achieving your own
  • How to reduce your stress, feel happier, and ADD 7 YEARS to YOUR LIFE
  • The way to start achieving your goals instantly – ludicrously simple, but 92% of people don’t know about it!
  • A unique strategy to quickly and easily rebound if you stumble or go off course.
  • Who to share your goals with and who not to – you'll be surprised by the answer!
  • A research-based system that you can start any time of year to experience results like never before!
title: The High Achiever's Goal-Setting Program
